data.enText: move near
to come near to sb/sth in distance or time

data.chText: 我们听见一辆汽车驶近的声音。
data.enText: We heard the sound of an approaching car/a car approaching.
Winter is approaching.

data.chText: 快到市镇时就可以看见左边的学院。
data.enText: As you approach the town, you'll see the college on the left.
offer/ask
to speak to sb about sth, especially to ask them for sth or to offer to do sth
She approached the bank for a loan.

data.chText: 一些对我们的产品感兴趣的公司已和我们接洽。
data.enText: We have been approached by a number of companies that are interested in our product.

data.chText: 我想征求他的意见，但发现很难和他谈得拢。
data.enText: I'd like to ask his opinion but I find him difficult to approach (= not easy to talk to in a friendly way) .
amount/quality
to come close to sth in amount, level or quality
profits approaching 30 million dollars

data.chText: 他语言之丰富很少有作家能望其项背。
data.enText: Few writers approach his richness of language.
problem/task
to start dealing with a problem, task, etc. in a particular way

data.chText: 什么是处理这个问题的最佳方式？
data.enText: What's the best way of approaching this problem?
to problem/task

data.chText: （待人接物或思考问题的）方式，方法，态度
data.enText: a way of dealing with sb/sth; a way of doing or thinking about sth such as a problem or a task

data.chText: 学校决定采取另外一种方式解决纪律问题。
data.enText: The school has decided to adopt a different approach to discipline.

data.chText: 她用错误的手段和他们打交道。
data.enText: She took the wrong approach in her dealings with them.
movement nearer
movement nearer to sb/sth in distance or time

data.chText: 她没有听见他走近的声音，所以门开时吓了一跳。
data.enText: She hadn't heard his approach and jumped as the door opened.
the approach of spring
offer/request
the act of speaking to sb about sth, especially when making an offer or a request

data.chText: 俱乐部已向当地一家公司寻求赞助。
data.enText: The club has made an approach to a local company for sponsorship.

data.chText: 她对他没完没了的纠缠极为反感。
data.enText: She resented his persistent approaches.
path/road
a path, road, etc. that leads to a place

data.chText: 通往宫殿的所有道路都有军队守卫。
data.enText: All the approaches to the palace were guarded by troops.
a new approach road to the port
of aircraft
the part of an aircraft's flight immediately before landing
to begin the final approach to the runway
sth similar
a thing that is like sth else that is mentioned

data.chText: 那是他所能作出的最似歉意的表示。
data.enText: That's the nearest approach to an apology you'll get from him.
the carrot and (the) stick (approach)

data.chText: 胡萝卜加大棒；威逼利诱
data.enText: if you use the carrot and stick approach , you persuade sb to try harder by offering them a reward if they do, or a punishment if they do not

simple_means.memory_skill: ap 加强 + proach 接近，靠近 → 接近

means: (待人接物或思考问题的)方式

ex.chText: 傍晚时分我们走近了那个村子。
ex.enText: We approached the village in the evening.

ex.chText: 我们举行婚礼的日子已经临近。
ex.enText: The day of our wedding has approached.

synonyms.bx: 使用范围很广，通常指在空间或时间上逐渐靠近。

ex.chText: 一场暴风雨正逐渐逼近该岛。
ex.enText: There was a storm bearing down on the island.

ex.chText: 敌方的一艘航空母舰快速逼近他们的驱逐舰。
ex.enText: An enemy carrier bore down on their destroyers.

synonyms.bx: 指速度很快且带有威胁地向某人、某物或某地移动，常后接介词 on。

ex.enText: His teaching method is quite traditional.

ex.chText: 这是中国学生学好英语的一种有效的方法。
ex.enText: This is an effective method for Chinese students to learn English well.

synonyms.bx: 指有计划地做某事的方法，尤指很多人都知道并使用的方法。

ex.chText: 他的新英语教学法很受学生欢迎。
ex.enText: His new approach to teaching English was very popular among the students.

ex.chText: 你为什么不采用传统的艺术评论方法呢？
ex.enText: Why don't you take a traditional approach to art criticism?

synonyms.bx: 指行事或处理问题的方法，常后接介词 to 。

ex.chText: 他像往常那样结束了讲话。
ex.enText: He finished the speech in his usual manner.

ex.chText: 他以这种方式死去，使得该事件更加复杂了。
ex.enText: The manner of his death made the matter more complicated.

synonyms.bx: 指做某事或某事发生的方式，通常只用单数。

ex.chText: 这是他们唯一的交流方式。
ex.enText: This is their only means of communication.

ex.chText: 体罚不应该作为约束儿童的手段。
ex.enText: Physical punishment should not be used as a means of controlling children.

synonyms.bx: 指做某事或为达到某种目的而采用的方法或手段。

ex.chText: 他们有不同的思维方式。
ex.enText: They have different modes of thought.

ex.chText: 她当时期待着过一种悠闲的生活。
ex.enText: She was looking forward to a relaxed mode of life.

synonyms.bx: 指行为、生活或做某事的方式，多因习惯、传统或习俗而形成，有时含刻板之意。

ex.chText: 你处理这个问题的方式是什么？
ex.enText: What is your way to tackle this problem?

ex.chText: 游泳是减肥的一种方式。
ex.enText: Swimming is one way to lose weight.

ex.chText: 他用他自己的方式爱她。
ex.enText: He loved her in his own way.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，可指做某事或达成某事的方法，也可指某事发生的方式。

ex.zh: 不同的/新的/新奇的方法

data.enText: the carrot and (the) stick (approach)

data.chText: 胡萝卜加大棒；威逼利诱
data.enText: if you use the carrot and stick approach , you persuade sb to try harder by offering them a reward if they do, or a punishment if they do not

tr: the act of drawing spatially closer to something
example: the hunter's approach scattered the geese

tr: a relatively short golf shot intended to put the ball onto the putting green
example: he lost the hole when his approach rolled over the green

tr: ideas or actions intended to deal with a problem or situation
example: his approach to every problem is to draw up a list of pros and cons
his plan of attack was misguided

tr: a way of entering or leaving
example: he took a wrong turn on the access to the bridge

tr: the temporal property of becoming nearer in time
a tentative suggestion designed to elicit the reactions of others
the event of one object coming closer to another
the final path followed by an aircraft as it is landing
make advances to someone, usually with a proposal or suggestion
example: I was approached by the President to serve as his adviser in foreign matters
The enemy army came nearer and nearer

tr: come near or verge on, resemble, come nearer in quality, or character
example: His playing approaches that of Horowitz

value.def: When you approach something, you get closer to it.

example.ex: He didn't approach the front door at once...
example.tran: 他没有马上走向前门。

example.ex: When I approached, they grew silent...
example.tran: 当我走近时，他们就不说话了。

example.ex: We turned to see the approaching car slow down.
example.tran: 我们转身看见驶近的车慢慢停下。

example.ex: At their approach the little boy ran away and hid.
example.tran: 他们一走近，小男孩就逃走藏了起来。

example.ex: ...the approach of a low-flying helicopter.
example.tran: 一架低空飞行的直升机的逼近

value.def: An approach to a place is a road, path, or other route that leads to it.

example.ex: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.
example.tran: 这条小路通往船屋。

value.def: If you approach someone about something, you speak to them about it for the first time, often making an offer or request.

example.ex: When Chappel approached me about the job, my first reaction was of disbelief...
example.tran: 当查普尔为这份工作找我商量时，我的第一反应是不相信。

example.ex: He approached me to create and design the restaurant...
example.tran: 他请我建造并设计该饭店。

example.ex: Anna approached several builders and was fortunate to come across Eddie.
example.tran: 安娜与几个建筑商有过接洽，并且很幸运地碰到了埃迪。

example.ex: There had already been approaches from buyers interested in the whole of the group.
example.tran: 已有对整组感兴趣的买家来进行洽谈。

value.def: When you approach a task, problem, or situation in a particular way, you deal with it or think about it in that way.

example.ex: The Bank has approached the issue in a practical way...
example.tran: 银行已经实际解决了这个问题。

example.ex: Employers are interested in how you approach problems.
example.tran: 雇主们对你如何处理问题感兴趣。

value.def: Your approach to a task, problem, or situation is the way you deal with it or think about it.

example.ex: We will be exploring different approaches to gathering information.
example.tran: 我们将探索收集信息的不同方法。

example.ex: ...the adversarial approach of the British legal system.
example.tran: 英国法律制度采用的辩论式审判模式

value.def: As a future time or event approaches, it gradually gets nearer as time passes.

example.ex: As autumn approached, the plants and colours in the garden changed.
example.tran: 秋天临近，花园中的草木和颜色也发生了变化。

example.ex: ...the approaching crisis.
example.tran: 步步逼近的危机

example.ex: ...the festive spirit that permeated the house with the approach of Christmas.
example.tran: 随着圣诞节临近房子里洋溢着的节日气氛

value.def: As you approach a future time or event, time passes so that you get gradually nearer to it.

example.ex: We approach the end of the year with the economy slowing and little sign of cheer.
example.tran: 接近年末时，我们面临经济迟滞、处处萧条的局面。

value.def: If something approaches a particular level or state, it almost reaches that level or state.

example.ex: Oil prices have approached their highest level for almost ten years...
example.tran: 石油价格已接近近10年中的最高水平。

example.ex: Mansell will race at average speeds approaching 200mph.
example.tran: 曼塞尔将以接近每小时200英里的平均车速参赛。

trans: 新方案；新方法；新途径；新措施；新方式
的方法
基本计算法；基本方法；基本法

对…进行探讨
分析法；分析性批评；分析方法；分析方式；解析法

系统方法；统的方法；系统论；系统面；系统法
整体观；整体性疗法；整体教学法；整体方法；全方位的治疗
直接招揽
进港航道；引水渠
务实取向；务实的方法，务实的态度
实验的；实验方法；实验设计的测度；实验法；实验处理
系统论方法；系统方法；政治系统论；系统法；系统分析法
收入法，所得方法

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to close, to become near 接近, 靠近
rootsaffixes.title: proach, proxim

partsOfSpeech.dec: ap 加强 + proach 接近，靠近 → 接近
approach 接近 + able 能…的 → 能够接近的 → 易接近的
ap 加强 + proxim 接近，靠近 + ate 具有…的，有…性质的 → 不断靠近、接近的→ 大约的
ap 表加强 + proxim 接近，靠近 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 大约
proxim 接近，靠近 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 接近
re 反 + proach 接近，靠近 → 接近的反面 → 责备
